vHi there: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! We truly appreciate your thoughts
column2: as they help us refine the overall user experience and improve the Ghostery extension.

vHi there: We understand your concern about pop-ups and ads slipping through—this is something we are actively working to address. Ghostery is designed to block most trackers and ads
column2: but we’re aware that some sites may still manage to bypass the blockers.
could you share any specific websites where you’ve noticed this issue? This would be incredibly helpful as we continue to fine-tune our extension to better meet your needs.

vHi there: Thank you again for your input
column2: and we hope to keep improving Ghostery to offer a smoother
